channel.description: I GET THIS IN MY RUN.BAT!! PLEASE HELP! Me And My Players Can't Login!!!!! HHHEEEELLLLLPP! PLEASE AND THANK YOU! [code]Loaded WorldMap In (36 ms)... Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:168) [/code]

item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:7, topic:378760”][quote author=Abandoned Dreams link=topic=474619.msg3470569#msg3470569 date=1295266431]

[quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=474619.msg3470560#msg3470560 date=1295265629]

You need to use “Tab” button in .cfg files. Not “Space”.
[/quote]There Isn’t A Space Out Of Place In Item.cfg… I Just Looked…
Theres Only 1 Space Like For:

Item = ID Or W.e Otherwize, No Spaces…?

Re-tab it anyway, the whole line.
[/quote]FFFFUUUCCCKKK STill Says Same Thing!!!
Loaded WorldMap In (36 ms)…

Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:168)

Is item.cfg the only .cfg file you edited?[/quote]Yes, And I Replaced It With A Copy Of It, And Still Gave Me That??!?!?! WTF???

Read full topic
